Description.Text: Set directly on the long sandy beach of Bavaro in the beautiful Dominican Republic, Barcelo Punta Cana Resort features a full array of pleasures for all ages - a wonderful choice for families, couples and singles.After a day full of activities as different watersports, land sports, dance lessons, climbing the rock wall, acting like an artist on the spectacular trapeze circus with its trampoline, swimming in the large free-form pool or just relaxing at the beach or in one of the 3 Jacuzzis retire to your room and prepare for the night. Choose your favorite plate and let your culinary dreams come true in our 7 restaurants. After you pass by at your favorite bar to relax and enjoy the evening with a tasty tropical cocktail in your hand, waiting for the colorful nightly entertainment that is filled with passion and temperament, to begin. Still not tired? Visit the Casino and try your luck or move on to the discotheque and rock the dance floor.From relaxed to active, Barcelee Punta Cana Resort has the vacation for you! Come to the Dominican Republic, the Caribbean's hottest destination of the last years, where soft, white sand beaches please your vision and the warm and turquoise sea invites to take your chance and live the Caribbean dream. Barcelo Punta Cana awaits you!

The Barcelo Premium Punta Cana boasts a coveted locale on a long stretch of pearl-white soft sand on Playa Arena Gorda in the Punta Cana region of the Dominican Republic. It is situated: 32 km/20 miles (25 minutes) from Punta Cana International Airport 65 km/40 miles km to Higuey, the nearest city 205 km from Santo Domingo, the capital and UNESCO World Heritage Site.

798 air-conditioned guestrooms, arranged in a sweeping 'S' shape formation of 7 white buildings, feature all you need for your holidays in paradise. From satellite TV, CD player, minibar stocked with soft drinks, coffee maker, iron and ironing board, separate full bathroom with shower, hairdryer and bath amenities, safety deposit box up to a private balcony or terrace where you can feel the gentle breeze coming from the ocean or just take a look at the beauty of tropical gardens.

Alcazar Buffet - ALL INCLUSIVE - Breakfast 7am 10.30am Lunch 12.30pm 2.30pm Dinner 6pm 10.00pmAlcazar Is The Buffet Main Restaurant Right Next To The Lobby Area Left Hand To The Reception. Buffet Style Serves Breakfast Lunch And Dinner With Changing Theme Gala Dinner Nights. EL MIRADOR - LOCATED IN FORM TO THE II POOL AND BEACH A LA CARTE RESTAURANT WITH TEX - MEX STYLE THE RESTAURANT IS AIR CONDITIONED AND IS STRICTLY NON SMOKING AREA AND OUT SITE AREA.A CASUAL ELEGANT DRESS CODE IS APPLIED AND RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED. 6:00 TO 10:00PM. MARLIN BBQ & SEA FOOD A LA CARTE - LOCATED BY THE POOL I SIDE DISTANCE FROM HOTEL -0.0MI /0.0KM 6:00to10:00pm A CASUAL ELEGANT DRESS CODE IS APPLIED AND RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated.No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No date, name and room change allowed. Rates are based on existing bedding only. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. IMPORTANT NOTE: Tariff NOT applicable for Dominican Republic Nationals NOTA IMPORTANTE: Tarifas no aplicables para ciudadanos de la Republica Dominicana Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding and no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated
